items.preText: Qaaid Mowlana : "A lot of Sri Lanka's 'mystery spinners' have only had short-lived success in the recent past, think Senanayake, Sandakan and now Dananjaya. The only one who had a slightly longer successful run was Ajantha Mendis, and he hasn't been around the international game for a long time now... "
items.text: this is pitched up outside off - right in the driving radar of Shakib - flayed away through extra cover. Hit through the line
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: dug in short and outside off, Tamim gets on top of it and fetches a pull. Heaved to deep midwicket

athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: a bit too full and outside off, Shakib needs just one hand to belt it past the left of the bowler. He drove early, his bottom hand flew off the bat, as he hit it past the bowler
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.preText: Qaaid Mowlana : "Sri Lanka showed signs of improvement in the batting in the last game, it's the bowling they need to sort out. Akila Dananjaya's impressive comeback to internationals is starting to fizzle out, Hasaranga only bowled three overs, Chameera was admittedly unlucky in the last game, and so far, the scary fact is that Thisara and Gunaratne have been SL's best bowlers in the series"
items.text: chest-high short ball on middle, good response from Shakib. He swats it with utmost control to deep midwicket
items.postText: Samitha Chathur: "Why the ball is not given to Asela Gunarathna? Whenever he comes to bowl, he takes wicket most of the times.. Sri Lanka is wasting his bowling skills..!!"
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: Tamim misjudges the pace and bounce. He is early into a hook, looks away, and cops a blow on the side of the helmet. The Bangladesh opener is good to resume

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: Tamim jumps off the ground, takes on a short ball outside off and swats a pull to the right of deep midwicket. What a riposte from Tamim after being pinged on the head
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: Thisara keeps peppering the batsmen with short balls. This one gets big on Shakib who is in no position to hook the ball over midwicket. He seems to have top-edged it onto his helmet. Thisara runs in from his followthrough but not Dickwella, and the ball lands safely eventually
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.preText: Asela comes on for his dibbly-dobblers
items.text: full and floated outside off, Tamim chops it fine of short third man and brings up the hosts' 100. The fielder at short third man mistimes his dive and allows the ball to skip away
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Mizan: "Hathurasingh well known about the Bangladeshi batsman weakness and strong side. Think it helps the SL bowler "
items.text: on a length and outside off, front-foot drive to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: floated on middle, stroked back to the right of the bowler
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on middle, tapped into the covers
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Taufiq_BD: "Tamim has been showing his supreme concentration for quite some time. Arrogance tuned into experience and now he himself and the team have been enjoying this excellence. "
items.text: Tamim presses forward and drives through the line to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fractionally short and wide outside off, square-cut away to the left of sweeper. Hasaranga does well in the deep to slide the ball in at the edge of the boundary
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, 3 runs

items.text: Thisara digs is short and outside off, Shakib rocks back and middles a hook to deep midwicket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
